name: 2 Guys 1 Knife
description:
AS SHOWCASED AT LEVEL UP 2018 Winner of "Best 1st Year Game" at UOIT GamesCon 2018! AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD

REQUIRES 2 GAMEPADS TO PLAY

ONLY XBOX 360 CONTROLLERS ARE OFFICIALLY SUPPORTED

CONTROLS

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim (Release to Throw)

Right Thumb - Press to Cancel Aim

LT & Left Stick - Dash

Note from support team:

As 2 Guys 1 Knife receives post-release support please bare with us, to enjoy the game at it's best it requires a functionality dependent installation of the Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015.

Download the Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015 here.

Please follow and complete the installation instructions for the redistributable provided by Microsoft before launching the game.

Thanks for playing!

- Elisha Sarkis, esarkisgamedev@gmail.com
